## removeEmpty() function

trims all strings and removes all strings that are pure whitespace from the list.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function removeEmpty(original: readonly string[]): string[];
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  original | <code>readonly string[]</code> | list of strings. |

<b>Returns:</b>

`string[]`

a list based on the original with all strings trimmed and any empty strings removed.
